title: Jonas Asare
text:
Jonas Asare (born 10 July 1997) is a <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> forward who last played for <a href="FK%20Javor%20Ivanjica">FK Javor Ivanjica</a> in <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a>.
Career.
Asare played with <a href="Grassland%20FC">Grassland FC</a> in Cameroon in the seasons 2015 and 2016, before arriving to Serbia during winter-break of the 2016–17 season and signing with top—league side <a href="FK%20Javor%20Ivanjica">FK Javor Ivanjica</a>. Asare signed contract with Javor until June 2020. He made his debut in the <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Serbian%20SuperLiga">2016–17 Serbian SuperLiga</a> on April 13, in a game against <a href="FK%20Radni%C4%8Dki%20Ni%C5%A1">FK Radnički Niš</a>. Asare was released by Javor in December 2017.
